about: I'm a highly motivated and skilled professional with a Master of Science degree in **Computer Science Engineering**, specializing in Machine Learning. As a **Solution Architect** at a prominent IT company, I thrive on designing innovative and practical solutions that leverage cutting-edge technology to address complex business challenges. With a deep fascination for technology, I constantly seek out new developments in the field and stay updated with the latest trends and advancements. I believe that technology has the power to shape our world and I'm dedicated to contributing to its positive impact through my work. Beyond my professional endeavors, I'm also a passionate **rugby player**.
